value.title: Q&A and create Power BI reports on Mobile
value.excerpt: Have you ever wondered how to create Power BI reports optimized for mobile? In this video I will show you how to do that and also how Q&A works in Power BI mobile.  EnjoY!  Jump to Q&A part of the video: https://youtu.be/ljYMcDOX8yo?t=294   Looking for a download file? Go to our Download Center: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

How do we fix this? Here is one way!  Dumbbell chart in charticulator: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gz6v8EDbjsw&ab_channel=CurbalDataLabs

value.title: Row Level Security in Power BI desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks #27
value.excerpt: In this video we will see how to add Row Level security to your Power BI data.  Row Level security is used to restrict data access for given users. Filters restrict data at the row level. You can define filters within roles. What is Row Level Security: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/powerbi-admin-rls/
